props.fill: Tabs fill full width of the tab bar
props.transition: Sets the animation effect when changing tabs. Valid values are: 'fade', 'fade-top-slide', 'fade-side-slide' or `empty string` to disabled animations. Animation speed can be set in the `--tabs-transition-duration` css variable.
props.modTabBar: Style of the tab bar element

emits.input:changed-tab: Emitted when another tab is activated

slots.tab-bar-append: Slot for the additional content in the tab bar
